verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician<s%> upon <S%H8067>Sheminith,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> of <S%H1732>David.<s%> <S%H3467>Help,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> for the <S%H2623>godly<s%> man <S%H1584>ceases;<s%> for the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H6461>fail<s%> from among the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H120>men.<s%>

They <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with his <S%H7453>neighbor:<s%> with <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips<s%> and with a double <S%H3820>heart<s%> do they <S%H1696>speak.<s%>
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall <S%H3772>cut<s%> off <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2513>flattering<s%> <S%H8193>lips,<s%> and the <S%H3956>tongue<s%> that <S%H1696>speaks<s%> <S%H1419>proud<s%> things:
<S%H834>Who<s%> have <S%H559>said,<s%> With our <S%H3956>tongue<s%> will we <S%H1396>prevail;<s%> our <S%H8193>lips<s%> are our own: <S%H4310>who<s%> is <S%H113>lord<s%> over us?

For the <S%H7701>oppression<s%> of the <S%H6041>poor,<s%> for the <S%H603>sighing<s%> of the <S%H34>needy,<s%> <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H6965>arise,<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> I will <S%H7896>set<s%> him in <S%H3468>safety<s%> from him that <S%H6315>puffs<s%> at him.

The <S%H565>words<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> are <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H565>words:<s%> as <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H6884>tried<s%> in a <S%H5948>furnace<s%> of <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H2212>purified<s%> <S%H7659>seven<s%> times.
You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> them, O <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> you shall <S%H5341>preserve<s%> them from <S%H2098>this<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
